Pre-Game Insights: The 1st T20 match of the Bangladesh Tour of India will see India take on Bangladesh at New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium, Gwalior on October 6, 2024, at 7:00 PM IST.
After winning the test series, India will look to start with a winning streak under Surya Kumar Yadav’s captaincy.
Some youngsters will make their debut for the first time in International cricket and are eager to play their first match against Bangladesh.
The pitch at New Madhavrao Scindia Cricket Stadium is expected to be batting-friendly, offering true bounce and consistent pace thanks to the red soil in the region.
The weather for Sunday, October 6, will be sunny with a high of 33°C and a low of 25°C, with no expected precipitation.
India and Bangladesh have faced each other in 14 T20 matches, with India winning 13 and Bangladesh winning 1.

India's predicted playing XI includes Abhishek Sharma, Sanju Samson (WK), Surya Kumar Yadav (C), Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Mayank Yadav, Ravi Bishnoi, Riyan Parag, and Washington Sundar.

Bangladesh's predicted playing XI includes Najmul Hossain Shanto (Captain), Tanzid Hasan Tamim, Parvez Hossain Emon, Tawhid Hridoy, Mahmud Ullah, Litton Kumer Das, Jaker Ali Anik, Mehidy Hassan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, Shoriful Islam, and Rakibul Hasan.
Abhishek Sharma is recommended as the captain and Suryakumar Yadav as the vice-captain for fantasy teams.
India is considered the favorite to win the match with a win probability of 65% compared to Bangladesh's 35%.
